stories.text:
I'm a ~senior engineer, worked for a handful of startups and larger companies. Mentorship and training is an area of work that I really want to explore, but I don't think it's my strongest skill right now. How can I improve?

Some people seem to have a natural ability to break complex topics down into comprehensible pieces. That's something I'd love to learn more thoroughly.
stories.title: Ask HN: Best resources on learning to be a better teacher or mentor?
Leading with commas – ugly or efficient? An investigation over 320 GB of SQL
Show HN: Zero - ship faster with low Code Infra for Fintech Founders

stories.text:
I purchased a very nice .io domain 2 days ago and I received an email from my registar today saying there was a bug in the registry and that the domain should not have been available so they are going to cancel my registration.

Right now I own the domain. What can I do? Is it okay for registries to do this? Does it happen often?

Thanks!
stories.title: Ask HN: I purchased a domain and now the registry wants to take it back
